code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AnimatedButton=_ref=>{let{className,idName,imgSrc,onClick}=_ref;const[isBulging,setIsBulging]=useState(false);const[isClicked,setIsClicked]=useState(false);const handleMouseOver=()=>{setIsBulging(true);};const handleMouseOut=()=>{setIsBulging(false);};const handleClick=()=>{setIsClicked(true);onClick();setTimeout(()=>{setIsClicked(false);},150);};const style={cursor:'pointer',scale:isClicked?'0.9':isBulging?'1.1':'1',transform:isClicked?'rotate(0)':isBulging?'rotate(-2deg)':'rotate(0deg)',transition:'scale 0.1s ease-in-out, transform 0.1s ease-in-out',filter:isClicked?'brightness(.95)':isBulging?'brightness(1.05)':'brightness(1)',zIndex:'9999'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:className!==null&&className!==void 0?className:null,id:idName!==null&&idName!==void 0?idName:null,onMouseOver:handleMouseOver,onMouseOut:handleMouseOut,onClick:handleClick!==null&&handleClick!==void 0?handleClick:null,style:style,src:imgSrc,draggable:'false',alt:''});};export default AnimatedButton;
